channel.title: About on Bogdan Radu
channel.description: Recent content in About on Bogdan Radu

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a PostDoc at the Radon instutute for computational and applied mathematics (RICAM) in Linz, Austria. I received my PhD in applied mathematics from TU Darmstadt on “Finite element mass lumping for H(div) and H(curl)" under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Herbert Egger. Research Interest I am an expert in finite element methods with mass lumping, where one seeks to replace the mass matrix $M$ by a suitable (block)diagonal approximation $M_h$ in the context of wave propagation problems.
